thread.title: Young Thug Hints At Upcoming Collab With The Weeknd
thread.title_full: Young Thug Hints At Upcoming Collab With The Weeknd

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Young Thug Hints At Upcoming Collab With The Weeknd
text:
Home > Music > Young Thug Hints At Upcoming Collab With The Weeknd Young Thug Hints At Upcoming Collab With The Weeknd 4 0 Posted by Kevin Goddard , Jan 6, 2017 at 11:28pm Young Thug & The Weeknd appear to have a new record in the works. 
It looks like Young Thug & The Weeknd have a new collab on the way. On Friday night, Thugger took to IG to share a pic of him & Abel together along with the caption “OTW,” which we presume is referring to an upcoming record that's "on the way." 
Unfortunately, no other details were given at this time as for when the record will arrive or what it'll be off of, but it'll probably be pretty fire. 
Check out the pic (below), and keep your eyes peeled for the upcoming record. We’ll of course keep you posted if any more information surfaces. Thoughts? A photo posted by ""JEFFERY"" (@thuggerthugger1) on Jan 6, 2017 at 7:04pm PST < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Jan 6, 2017 at 11:28pm 48 Views 
According to 50 Cent, Soulja Boy might've been robbed in L.A. on Friday. Young Thug & The Weeknd appear to have a new record in the works. 
It looks like Young Thug & The Weeknd have a new collab on the way. On Friday night, Thugger took to IG to share a pic of him & Abel together along with the caption “OTW,” which we presume is referring to an upcoming record that's "on the way." 
Unfortunately, no other details were given at this time as for when the record will arrive or what it'll be off of, but it'll probably be pretty fire.
